extendedInfo.description: Can you jump your hero through the universe to safety? Leap from planet to planet, defeat the monsters and get on the leaderboard!Space Hero is the latest, fiendishly addictive title from FT Games. Do you accept the challenge?How to play:1. Guide your hero by jumping from planet to planet2. Jump by tapping the screen at just the right moment3. Kill all the space monsters along the way to get the highest score.4. Login with Facebook. Battle your friends, send gifts or check out the leaderboard to see who the real Space Hero is!Features:1.FACEBOOK TOURNAMENTBattle your Facebook friends for high scores. The more the merrier!2.AWESOME POWER-UPSUse Power-Ups to take your score into the next dimension!3.FIVE GREAT CHARACTERS TO CHOOSE FROMWho is your favourite?4.ACHIEVEMENTS & REWARDSThere are so many achievements, rewards and bonus rounds to keep you playing. In Space Hero, there's always a new challenge!

reviews.title: Love it fun & fast
reviews.comment: Cool, fun& fast

reviews.title: Try it
reviews.comment: This game will definitely stay on my phone.fast, in your face,whirling action.nice graphics too.

reviews.title: Vif et intelligent
reviews.comment: Ce jeu merite bien 5, cest rapid et bcp de reflexe

reviews.title: The price hike
reviews.comment: EVERYTHING is now 8x more expensive than the fist time I played this game.
reviews.author: Joshua Abellanosa

reviews.title: Good But . .
reviews.comment: Its kinda good for killing time, actually, i like it, but it just bothers me when i get the score multiplier/booster, im lagging like hell, and it makes me dodge every score muliplier/booster just to avoid the lag, please fix this, tnx
reviews.author: Rolenn Pyx Lolarga

reviews.comment: I love it, but it\'s bullsh*t we can\'t use gems anymore to save character. Not to mention, the pay option NEVER works anyway. Wtf?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FROM HERO TO ZERO :(
reviews.comment: I\342\200\230ve installed the game in my other phone. Everything is doubled up. The coins, the gems. I thought that was the worst. BUT NO, THIS IS THE WORST UPDATE EVER!! I gave you 4stars before this. Such a downgrade. Need to save hero with 0.99$? Why why why why you changed this. I prefer use gems. I freaking in love with this game. Please don\342\200\230t make me uninstall it. :(
reviews.author: N Aysh

reviews.title: Horrible update!
reviews.comment: All I gotta say is PURE GREED! 99\302\242 just to save the character... Way to ruin a perfect game! It\'s gotta be a bug... Nope just greed... Uninstalled...
reviews.author: Jorge Bracetty

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: Cool game! I like it. It\'s well balanced between pushing me a reaction and having me a time to think about timing!

reviews.comment: Not a bad game at all.

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: Verry Unique game, but easy to play..and addictive, enjoy to killing time..  Game yang asyik dimainin disaat santai dan tidak ada kerjaan..

reviews.title: SUPER FUN! !
reviews.comment: This is really addicting, fun fast paced game. Will give five stars when you stop the constant and annoying notifications asking me to play. I play when I get ready.

reviews.title: Cash to save me..  Hahaha gems will do! Opp not anymore.
reviews.comment: The game fell short, after it started asking  for cash to be saved in order to continue  ur run for the high score. Before the update it was fine to us gems.  Bring that black! Then u shall receive a 5star that u deserve.

reviews.title: UPDATE RUINED IT!
reviews.comment: Game used to be kicka**. Since update it lags horribly & the dev got greedy when it comes to saving your character. Total crap-change it back

reviews.title: Was awesome
reviews.comment: Sure wish I could uninstall the updates :(...I didnt even mind doing the free gem offers which i never do, but that was before when you could use them for \"save me\" now Its $0.99 and didnt have to wait 30 min for every energy.  No thanks.  Was great...too bad.
